name: Momote
tag_list: mobile, android, iphone, windows-mobile, winmob, consultancy, management, field-worker, administrative
overview:
Momote primarily develop management software for companies with a mobile workforce. Such a system normally involves a web application for administrative staff, and a mobile application for field workers. Momote use their own technology (MX) to develop the application once, and deploy on Android, iOS, or Windows Mobile devices. MX is also available for developers outside of the company to purchase licenses for, and there are plans to allow developers to use the tools for free on small projects.

Momote offer consultancy for bespoke applications, and licence the MX technology for software developers to build applications. Momote also develop showcase applications for hardware manufacturers to show off the features of their device.
